entity.name: author
entity.query:
select h.id, h.heading, h.sort as headingSort, type_desc.name as headingTypeDesc, "author" as headingType, h.works_by as worksBy, h.works_about as worksAbout, group_concat( h2.heading, "|", r2.ref_desc,"|", h2.works_by, "|", h2.works_about SEPARATOR "YYYYY") as seeAlsos, group_concat( h3.heading, "|", r3.ref_desc,"|", h3.works_by, "|", h3.works_about SEPARATOR "YYYYY") as preferedForms from heading as h, type_desc
left join (reference as r2, heading as h2, ref_type as rt2) on (r2.from_heading = h.id and h2.id = r2.to_heading and r2.ref_type = rt2.id and rt2.name = "seeAlso" )
left join (reference as r3, heading as h3, ref_type as rt3) on (r3.from_heading = h.id and h3.id = r3.to_heading and r3.ref_type = rt3.id and rt3.name = "preferedForm" )
where h.type_desc = type_desc.id and (h.works_by > 0 or h2.works_by > 0 or h3.works_by > 0) group by h.id

entity.name: altForms
entity.query: select form as alternateForm from alt_form where heading_id = ${author.id} order by 1
